subject: Re: HtmlUnit and Cookies
msgSnippet: The problem was with the version of the HtmlUnit JAR file that I was using. Downloaded the latest version and it works like a charm. -- Srini ...
messageBody:
The problem was with the version of the HtmlUnit JAR
file that I was using. Downloaded the latest version
and it works like a charm.

-- Srini



> Hi,
> I use HtmlUnit for testing our web application.
> To
> test one of the web components, I need to set a
> specific cookie before the component can be tested.
>
> I tried,
>
webConnection.getStateForUrl(url).addCookie(myCookie).
>
>
> But, the method getStateForUrl always returns null
> and
> the above always failed.
>
> If you any of you ran into a similar issue, could
> you
> please share your thoughts/ideas on the same.
>
> Thank you
> Srini
>
>
>
>
>
> __________________________________
